numbered_ace_sentences: 1. At first glance, it is more common that young women communicate with their parents throughout the week.
2. The statistics for women in the three categories sum to more than 100 percent.
3. This suggests that many young women use several different methods to talk to their parents.
4. This is much higher than for men.
5. The statistics for men in the three categories sum to about 100 percent.
6. This suggests that young men do not communicate with their parents as regularly as young women do.
7. This may be because societal standards exist.
8. According to societal standards, women are raised to be mindful of their family.
9. According to societal standards, women are raised to be sensitive to the physical needs of other people.
10. According to societal standards, women are raised to be sensitive to the emotional needs of other people.
11. A social conception of masculinity exists.
12. According to the social conception of masculinity, men are raised to become independent.
13. According to the social conception of masculinity, men are raised to be less openly emotional in their relationships.
14. According to the social conception of masculinity, men are raised to be less communicative in their relationships.
15. Therefore, young adult men are less likely to maintain a close relationship with their parents.
